items.description: SQL injection vulnerability in UserController.authenticate() - not sanitizing input
items.source_context: The `UserController.authenticate()` function has a critical security vulnerability - it's not properly sanitizing input before SQL queries. This could lead to SQL injection.

items.description: Refactor logging module to use structured logging
items.source_context: TODO: Refactor the logging module to use structured logging instead of print statements

items.description: Payment processing fails intermittently with connection timeout errors
items.source_context: The payment processing seems to fail intermittently. I'm seeing errors in production logs about "Connection timeout to payment gateway". This is blocking users from completing purchases!

items.description: Cache invalidation logic in ProductService is broken
items.source_context: FIXME: The cache invalidation logic in `ProductService` is broken

items.description: Add rate limiting to API endpoints
items.source_context: We should probably add rate limiting to the API endpoints

items.description: Migrate to PostgreSQL for better JSON support
items.source_context: Consider migrating to PostgreSQL instead of MySQL for better JSON support

items.description: Build real-time notification system using WebSockets
items.source_context: what if we built a real-time notification system using WebSockets? That could be a cool project for next quarter.

items.description: Email service down - customers not receiving confirmation emails
items.source_context: urgently need to fix the email service - it's been down for 2 hours and customers aren't receiving confirmation emails.
